title: Turgay56
author: Turgay56
content: First of all I am no bonus user and I bet just on Major Leagues.. Like NBA , Major Football Leagues etc. Even though Sportsbet.io does not pay my money..those bookies who steal the money of a major league players like me can steal anyone's money.. be careful guys !I withdraw arround $8000 but  they do not pay $1400 in my account.. The reason they just do not want ! What kinda bookie it is ? Even I dont bet on single game .. Only combos..My Deposite : $3000Stolen Amount : $1400Here are screenshots of all my bets !! and screenshot of locked accounthttps://imgur.com/a/4k9LWb6https://imgur.com/a/oyWJayihttps://imgur.com/a/OLGBAavhttps://imgur.com/a/4bQWZtOhttps://imgur.com/a/Ckmh3eThttps://imgur.com/a/Tv5u0rLhttps://imgur.com/a/bQ8HHbwhttps://imgur.com/a/kWGljgYhttps://imgur.com/a/4bQWZtO

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I'll suggest you to follow this scam report format[1] to make it more understandable. I suggest you to include all information as much as possible because you were talking to a high reputed platform, sportsbet.io to be exact. Scamming $1400 is too little for them to ruin their reputation.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Turgay56 on January 24, 2023, 02:45:36 PMI withdraw arround $8000 but  they do not pay $1400 in my account.. The reason they just do not want ! What kinda bookie it is ? Even I dont bet on single game .. Only combos..what exactly are you saying here? is there any confirmation for this claim?have you contacted them at all or tried to contact them and ask for an explanation? you have already withdrawn $8k, why do you think they allowed withdraw $8k and stopped $1400? Also, in which time period everything happens?are you sure that you have not violated anything from their TOS for a single moment?So many questions, you should definitely present a proper scam accusation with all the evidence.

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: First of all, there is no need to create multiple posts/threads if there is an honest misunderstand (it happens).I would suggest you reach out to Steve; he's the guy that should be able to help you (as long as you're playing by the rules).

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Turgay56 on January 24, 2023, 02:45:36 PMI withdraw arround $8000 but  they do not pay $1400 in my account.. The reason they just do not want ! What kinda bookie it is ? Even I dont bet on single game .. Only combos..My Deposite : $3000Stolen Amount : $1400You withdraw $8000 from their site and now you claim that they scammed you of $1500. Is this logical? If they are scammers, they will not make you withdraw any funds, after your account has been locked. Did you get a message from Sportsbet informing you of the reason for the lock? Have you seen the general rules of betting on their site? Have you read their terms & conditions? I advise you to contact their support, you may know from them the reason that led to locking your account and confiscating the funds, or to contact Steve in this forum, as mentioned by the person above me.QuoteSportsbet.io has the right to confiscate any deposits on accounts registered by users previously found in violation or disregard of previous warnings of the terms and conditions.[1] https://sportsbet.io/help-centre/help-other/help-other-terms-and-conditions/general-terms-conditions[2] https://sportsbet.io/help-centre/help-place-a-bet/help-placing-a-bet-general-betting-rules

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: Turgay56 on January 24, 2023, 02:45:36 PMThe reason they just do not wantWhat do you mean by "they do not want"? Was this the answer of their customer support, do you have a screenshot of the conversation? Am asking this because no professional support agent would ever say something like that and sportsbet has a good reputation, afaik.I just checked sportsbet's announcement thread and Steve already responded to your comment there (which seems to be deleted) stating that they have contacted you. Check your emails.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Are you a verified account? Because if you withdraw anything above a few dozen $$$ then they will ask for KYC (as in, the version with live shots of your documents and your selfie).

comments.author: SamboNZ
comments.body: if you are winning lots of time then it is reasonable for them to lock your account. they do not like people who is winning many times.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Quote from: SamboNZ on January 26, 2023, 01:47:43 AMif you are winning lots of time then it is reasonable for them to lock your account. they do not like people who is winning many times.Why are you twisting it? Every casino is not like 1xcraps. You do not have any idea about Sportsbets reputation. I believe there is a misunderstanding or maybe something else. Every casinos are not the same. If community see such behavior from a casino. The Community DT members always ask you for proves and if you can show them, The casino account will get negative feedback. So, Don't throw stones blindly.

comments.author: moviemorgan570
comments.body: now they will say you violted some terms and will post some of their terms .You made multibets and didnt used any bonus amounts right?then whats their issue to pay?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Turgay56 on January 24, 2023, 02:45:36 PMI withdraw arround $8000 but  they do not pay $1400 in my account.. The reason they just do not want ! What kinda bookie it is ? Even I dont bet on single game .. Only combos..Those sites that can pay 8000$ out of 9400$ cant be scams. I think there is something wrong either on the bet or there might have been any policy violation for et or the account. Better try to reach the site so that you can get a solution; I think they will handle the issue positively.
